snippet: The dismissals were apparently an attempt by the company, Anglo American Platinum, to stem the tide of wildcat strikes that have unsettled Africa’s biggest economy.
abstract: Anglo American Platinum, world's top platinum producer, fires 12,000 workers who refused to return to work, apparently an effort to stem tide of wildcat strikes that have shaken South Africa's mining industry and unsettled Africa's biggest economy.
lead_paragraph: The dismissals were apparently an attempt by the company, Anglo American Platinum, to stem the tide of wildcat strikes that have unsettled Africa’s biggest economy.

headline.seo: Anglo American Platinum Fires 12,000 Striking Miners
headline.main: Platinum Company Fires 12,000 Striking Miners in South Africa
headline.print_headline: Platinum Company Fires 12,000 Striking Miners in South Africa
